name: Toys From Hell
description:
Jacob Bulldin returns to his childhood house twenty years later after his adoptive family disappeared, But as soon as he walks through the front door, He gets an uneasy feeling and tries to leave.

He then realizes that something has locked the door behind him, As he hears noises throughout the house closing in.

He is now at the mercy of his childhood toys...

Only the Demo is available at this moment, The full game will hopefully be released in 2022!
